start.subtitle: Atala PRISM is a decentralized identity solution that enables people to own their personal data and seamlessly interact with organizations in a secure and private way.

intro.question: Atala PRISM fosters growth in the digital economy

credentials.title: For Growing Businesses
credentials.text: Expand your customer base, increase your profits and future proof your business.
credentials.bullet1: Immediate customer verification via reusable KYC credentials means fewer scams, as well as reduced time and cost to authenticate your customers.
credentials.bullet2: Easily comply with regulatory requirements (including GDPR) with built-in data and privacy compliance.
credentials.bullet3: Reduce abandoned sales levels with instant registration and checkout to your products and services.
credentials.bullet4: Offer your customers a streamlined experience with hassle-free, automated user journeys.
credentials.bullet5: Enable your customers to access your products and services with a single click. Eliminate long forms and make life easier.

wallet.title: For Effective Governments
wallet.text: Implement secure, next-generation services that make your government more effective, responsive and agile.
wallet.bullet1: Improve administrative efficiency within departments with fewer face-to-face verifications. Go digital.
wallet.bullet2: Verified digital identity for everyone means a significant reduction in fraud levels against all parties – individuals, businesses, organizations and government.
wallet.bullet3: Enable instant access to public and private sector services with a single, universal digital identity. Individuals spending less time authenticating who they are and registering for services means a better overall experience.
wallet.bullet4: Get rid of any manual paperwork and use a secure digital format instead. Prepare for growth with smart digital services.

crypto.title: For Empowered Individuals
crypto.text: Open up a world of opportunity by empowering individuals to own their personal data and access a myriad of services.
crypto.bullet1: Become the sole owner of your digital identity and data. Use and retain ownership across all platforms.
crypto.bullet2: You are in charge of your data. Send it only to people and organizations you trust.
crypto.bullet3: Manage who can access your data. No more third parties snooping into your private information without your knowledge or consent.
crypto.bullet4: Store all your important credentials like your identity, licenses or qualifications in one safe, portable place, right on your phone.
crypto.bullet5: Instantly access a variety of services. No more forms. No more passwords. No more wasted time.

credential.credentialAlt: Credential example that shows a credential with filled info (degree, student and university name, award and dates of start and graduation)
credential.title: Key Components
credential.component1: Offer end-users a customizable mobile app for receiving, storing and sharing digital credentials.
credential.component2: Integrate a digital identity functionality straight into your apps.
credential.component3: Easily issue or verify digital credentials with the user-friendly, decentralized management platform.
credential.component4: Streamline your processes  by integrating credential issuance and verification into your workflow.
credential.component5: Capture biometric data as part of the onboarding process using a lightweight mobile app.
credential.component6: Expand your ecosystem using a low-cost smart card for storing and sharing digital credentials.

quotes.phrase: Decentralized identity provides a new way to own your personal information and enables secure and trusted transactions in your everyday life

trust.info: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page.
trust.mobile: Mobile phones with screens of the mobile app
trust.component3: Tool for issuing and verifying credentials.
trust.benefit1: Atala PRISM is built on Cardano, which is designed for sustainability and based on peer-reviewed academic research.
trust.benefit2: It can scale to millions of users with confidence using state-of-the-art, layer 2 technology.
trust.benefit3: Designed based on the latest standards and specifications in decentralized identity. Built on open-source software and engineered for interoperability.
trust.benefit4: Designed for everyone. Even those without smartphones, internet access or sufficient literacy can own a verifiable identity.
trust.benefit5: It can cost-efficiently onboard millions of users and implements a novel batching scheme to reduce public blockchain fees.
trust.benefit6: It supports flexible deployment models and choice of the underlying blockchain platform.

caseStudy.title: Identity and Credentials Verification Pilot
caseStudy.part1: Graduates need access to the degrees they earned to join the workforce and that's why Atala PRISM is teaming up with the Ministry of Education and universities in the Republic of Georgia. With Atala PRISM, students can receive, store and send their achievements right from their phone. Immediate verification of credentials means no need for background checks, saving universities and employers valuable time and resource.
caseStudy.part2: The launch of Atala PRISM in Georgia establishes a new gold standard of authenticating digital identity and credentials. Businesses, governments and individuals can reap the benefits of this smart, decentralized solution.

getStarted.title: We work with your team to:
getStarted.part1: Help you understand decentralised identity and the bold opportunity it presents for your business.
getStarted.part2: Develop a Proof of Concept, built by a team of leading engineers who have designed some of the most advanced blockchain protocols available.
getStarted.part3: Deploy, manage and scale your business.

faqPanel.title: Your questions, answered
faqPanel.faq1: Atala PRISM is a decentralized identity solution that is built on the Cardano blockchain. It enables a new approach to identity where users own their identity and have complete control over how their personal data is used and accessed. Data is shared with other individuals or organizations over secure and private peer-to-peer communication channels. Atala PRISM is designed for everybody.
faqPanel.titlefaq2: What problems does Atala PRISM solve?
faqPanel.faq2: Current identity systems create a significant risk and cost for businesses as they are required to store and secure sensitive information. Governments face inefficiencies in their manual-based, bureaucratic processes, as well as personal data frauds. Individuals also have a lack of trust that their information might be misused or sold to third parties without their consent. Atala PRISM solves these problems by enabling a new approach for digital identity where people have ownership of their personal information and only share what is required with businesses or institutions  in an easy, secure and private way.
faqPanel.faq3: Atala PRISM is for businesses, governments and individuals. Businesses can quickly onboard new customers, reduce compliance risks and costs, and deliver seamless user experiences. Governments can issue digital identities and enable instant access to public and private services. Individuals have ownership of their identity and data, and can control how their personal information is used and accessed.
faqPanel.titlefaq4: How do I know that personal data and identification are safe with Atala PRISM?
faqPanel.faq4: All personal information is securely and privately stored on your consumers’ smartphones or smartcards. Leveraging blockchain technology, Atala PRISM ensures that transactions are performed in a secure, peer-to-peer fashion. Each of your consumers is the only person with access to their data and credentials.
faqPanel.titlefaq5: How does removing third parties keep personal data and information safe?
faqPanel.faq5: Third parties, including technology companies and municipalities, can sell personal information, prevent individuals from accessing their data or shut down their account without permission. With Atala PRISM, individuals have complete control over their own data.
faqPanel.titlefaq6: Isn’t Atala PRISM a third party that is in control of personal data?
faqPanel.faq6: No. All data is securely stored and encrypted on the individual’s phone or smartcard. Each individual is the only person that can access it using their biometrics (i.e. fingerprint or faceID) or PIN code.
faqPanel.titlefaq7: Are identity and credentials shareable only within the Atala PRISM ecosystem?
faqPanel.faq7: Anyone can integrate with Atala PRISM. Since it is built using industry standards, third-party apps will be able to connect easily in the future.

useCasesPanel.title: Use Cases
useCasesPanel.subtitle: Atala PRISM enables the issuance of digital identities and credentials that users own and control. They can be shared in an easy, secure and private way. They are instantly verifiable from anywhere and eliminate the need for third party verification services.

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.successfullyIssued: The Credential has been successfully issued

studentPersona.title: This is Jo.
studentPersona.description: Join Jo on her journey through the smart city powered by Atala PRISM!
studentPersona.history: As a recent graduate, she is on the lookout for her first job. Part of the ‘mobile first generation’, her phone is where life happens. Instead of old fashioned documents, it makes sense for her to hold and manage her identity and credentials straight from her phone.

touristPersona.title: This is Grace.
touristPersona.description: Join Grace on her journey through the smart city powered by Atala PRISM!
touristPersona.history: Grace is a young globetrotter who enjoys visiting new places. She likes to travel light and as efficiently as possible. So it feels natural to her to carry all her traveling documentation straight on her phone.

executivePersona.title: This is Brandon.
executivePersona.description: Join Brandon on his journey through the smart city powered by Atala PRISM!
executivePersona.history: As a business executive, Brandon needs to attend conferences and client offices often. He likes to be up-to-speed with innovative technologies both in his office and outside of it. That’s why he prefers to live the smart way with all important documentation stored straight on his phone.

credentialDescription.CredentialType0: Metropol city has announced that all residents will be issued with a new digital ID. This forward thinking initiative will give citizens fast and friction-free access to many government and municipal services, making it easier than ever before to take public transport, pay city taxes and vote on local issues, straight from your phone. The city simply verifies the resident and issues a digital ID that is stored securely on their Atala PRISM wallet. Metropol City Resident Jo is excited that this verified digital ID enables her to live smarter; straight from her phone.
credentialDescription.CredentialType1: After graduating, Jo finds out that her University will be issuing her degree digitally. This innovative approach means that potential employers will be able to instantly verify her degree, making the process of recruitment much faster. All Jo needs to do is use Atala PRISM to share her digital ID with her University, who will issue her with her ‘digital degree’. It’s super convenient for everyone and means that Jo can put her years of studying to good use, faster.
credentialDescription.CredentialType2: After finding her dream role at a Startup, Jo’s new employer issues her with a ‘Proof of Employment’ certificate that she can access via the Atala PRISM app. This certificate enables Jo to live her life even more efficiently, including renting an apartment closer to her new office. After finding her perfect place, Jo simply uses her Atala PRISM app to demonstrate Proof of Employment to the landlord. She doesn't need to waste time filling out lengthy forms and submitting to lengthy background checks.
credentialDescription.CredentialType3: Atala PRISM is making Jo’s working life smarter and more streamlined and the next step is to add her health insurance. All she needs to do is share her ID and Proof of Employment with the insurance company via Atala PRISM. In the future, Jo will be able to use her phone to share her insurance details with her doctor or pick up a prescription at a local pharmacy. All confidentially, securely and in seconds.
